Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui

Class BaseTuiView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.BaseTuiView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<ViewEvent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TuiView
public abstract class BaseTuiView extends View
Base class that contains the logic for rendering the TUI. It is responsible for managing the rendering thread and the terminal. It also provides a debug view that shows the time taken for layout and drawing.

    • onShutdown

      protected void onShutdown()
      This method is called when the application is shutting down and should be used to clean up resources. It is called by the shutdown hook, so it will run in a separate thread.

      This method should be overridden by subclasses to clean up resources.

    • render

      protected void render()
      Renders the view.

      This method should always be called on the rendering thread. It will compose the view (by calling compose()), calculate the layout, draw it and print it to the terminal.

      If the debug view is enabled, it will also print the time taken for layout and drawing (at the bottom of the screen).

    • compose

      protected abstract Component compose()
      Composes the view.

      This method should be overridden by subclasses to compose the view. It should return the root component of the view.

      Returns:
      the root component of the view
